remarks: A line segment between two sides of a triange intersects a segment crossing from the remaining side to the opposite vertex.  Theorem 3.17 of [Schwabhauser] p. 33.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Sep-2013.)
statement:
trisegint $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( D e. ( EE ` N ) /\ E e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( B Btwn <. A , C >. /\ E Btwn <. D , C >. /\ P Btwn <. A , D >. ) -> E. q e. ( EE ` N ) ( q Btwn <. P , C >. /\ q Btwn <. B , E >. ) ) ) $.
$d A q $.
$d B q $.
$d C q $.
$d D q $.
$d E q $.
$d N q $.
$d P q $.
